articles.title: Mass Rally of Pyongyangites Held
articles.content:
Mass Rally of Pyongyangites Held 
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A mass rally of Pyongyangites was held at Kim Il Sung Square on Saturday to vow to thoroughly implement the militant tasks set forth in the joint New Year editorial.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok and Yang Hyong Sop, leading officials of ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations and more than 100,000 citizens from all walks of life.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his report at the rally that all the Party members and other working people in the capital city of Pyongyang should concentrate all efforts on improving the people's standard of living under the slogan "Bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea!" and thus successfully translate the noble intention of the WPK into reality.
					
					 Light-industrial factories should realize on a high level the work for putting their production processes on a modern and IT basis and turn out in a larger quantity various kinds of quality consumer goods favored by the public, urged the reporter.
					
					 He underlined the need to sharply raise the per-hectare yield of grain by thoroughly implementing the Party's policy of agricultural revolution, increase the capacities of up-to-date stockbreeding, fish farming and fruit production bases to enable the people to benefit from them as early as possible and successfully enforce the popular policies of the socialist state and the benevolent measures of the WPK.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 Basic industry sectors, vanguard sectors of the national economy should supply fully and in time electricity, coal and raw and other materials needed for the economic development and the improvement of the standard of people's living in the capital city, dynamically push forward the construction of 100,000 flats in Pyongyang and bring about innovations in city management.
					
					 The reporter also stressed the need to bring about a turn in science and technology, education and literary and art work and firmly establish the trait of giving priority to military affairs, preferentially supply everything necessary for the defence industry and sincerely aid the KPA.
					
					 Delegates of different social strata in their speeches called upon all the officials, Party members and other working people to become vanguard fighters devotedly defending their leader and performers of feats and ardent patriots who demonstrate the heroic spirit and mettle of the Koreans by holding supremacy in the world.
					
					 Then there was a mass demonstration at the end of the rally.

articles.title: New Year Greetings from Chongryon
articles.content:
New Year Greetings from Chongryon
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received messages and letters of greetings from organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Among them are the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, the Central Standing Committees of the Korean Youth League in Japan and the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, the Central Standing Councils of the Union of Korean Education Association in Japan, the Korean Science and Technology Association in Japan and the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, the Standing Council of the Korean Amateur Athletic Federation in Japan, the Central  Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, the Central Standing Council of the Korean Medical Association in Japan and the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Students Union in Japan, the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, the Central Standing Council of 
					
					 the Korean Human Rights Federation in Japan and other central organizations of Chongryon and its affiliated organizations, the Choson Sinbo Company, the Korea News Service, the Hagu Bookshop, the Kumgangsan Opera Troupe, Tonghae Ltd., the Korean Goods Sales Company, the Committee for Promoting Korea-Japan Economic Exchange, the Federation of Joint Economic Venture of Korean Residents in Japan, the Center for Consulting Marriage of Korean Youth in Japan, the Korean Press Hall and other enterprises, different prefectural headquarters of Chongryon, Joson University and Korean schools at all levels and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The messages and letters extended highest glory and the warmest greetings to Kim Jong Il in profound reverence on the occasion of the New Year.
					
					 They evinced their determination to consolidate the Chongryon organization as the ranks of single-minded unity with firm faith and pluck that it would surely emerge victorious only when it is under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, intensify the "movement to invite Koreans to come to the fold of Chongryon" into an all-Korean campaign to rally broad strata of Koreans from all walks of life around Chongryon and take an active part in the struggle to preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in the idea of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: New Year Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Year Stamp Issued
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A stamp has been issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to greet the New Year Juche 99 (2010).
					The stamp, with a picture of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, reflects the firm determination of the Korean army and people to build a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation on this land without fail, closely rallied in one mind around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					A souvenir sheet and two individual stamps representing Korean tiger have also been brought out.

articles.title: Triplets Born
articles.content:
Triplets Born
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Girl triplets were born at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital at 0:00 on January 1 this year.
					 The name of their mother is Ro Chun Ok and their father is an officer of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The new-born babies (first 2.02kg, second 1.89kg, third 1.99kg) are growing well in incubators.
					
					 Their mother received treatment under the deep concern of medical workers after being hospitalized there in October last year. Best medical aids as well as tonics are being administered to her thanks to the solicitude shown by the Workers' Party of Korea for the women who gave birth to many babies.

articles.title: Natural Wonders on Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Natural Wonders on Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- There were natural wonders on Mt. Paektu Friday morning.
					 According to the Group for Comprehensive Exploration of Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu, myriads of natural wonders could be seen on peaks of Mt. Paektu, the side of Lake Chon and in the sky over the mountain. 
					
					 The northwestern wind over 50 meters per second gradually lost its force from early in the morning of the New Year's Day, weather getting windless and calm. 
					
					 The temperature on Mt. Paektu where an unusually biting cold had persisted registered 30 degrees C. below zero, relatively mild temperature as compared with ordinary one in this area. The sky was unusually clear with twinkling stars. 
					
					 The sky of Mt. Paektu was bright with full moon till the dawn of the day, the visibility registering 10 meters. 
					
					 Venus called "Saeppyol" shed exceptionally bright rays over Lake Chon at sunrise.
					
					 The sound of ice breaking on the lake resounded in the old crater, breaking the silence early morning. 
					
					 Such big noise continued from 5 a.m. to 8 due to the difference between the atmospheric temperature and water temperature under the ice. 
					
					 The majestic sunrise began at 7:38 and 216 peaks of the mountain presented fantastic scenery. 
					
					 As there came strong wind from around 9 a.m., avalanche of hundreds of cubic meters rushed down to the lakeside from the peaks including Janggun Peak, Hyangdo Peak and Haeppal Peak.
					
					 Hot vapor was seen rising from the hot spring on the lakeside.

articles.title: Collection of Korean Famous Music Off Press in China
articles.content:
Collection of Korean Famous Music Off Press in China
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- A collection of Korean famous music was published by the Beijing Publishing and Media Co., Ltd. and the Beijing Publishing House on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and China.
					 It consists of translated and edited versions of 130 songs loved by the Korean people in 8 themes such as "Sing Revolution", "Sing Homeland" and "Sing Army and People".

articles.title: DPRK Replete with Traits of Assisting Army
articles.content:
DPRK Replete with Traits of Assisting Army
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean people regard the soldiers of the Korean People's Army as their own flesh and blood and assist them in all sincerity, aware that the army assistance is a capital manifestation of patriotism.
					 Officials of the Pyongyang City People's Committee have visited KPA units at the forefront more than 110 times with aiding materials since a dozen years ago and the Mangyongdae District Restaurants Management Office has devotedly helped servicepersons in nearly 20 years.
					
					 Officials and employees of affiliated enterprises of the Chollima Steel Complex have done their bits in assisting soldiers so that they could perform feats during the days of their military service with a sense of honor.
					
					 The Jagang Provincial People's Hospital has offered a sincere medical treatment to servicepersons and Hyesan City People's Hospital No. 1 saved a soldier severely injured by an accident in the discharge of his duty and sent him back to his unit.
					
					 The number of those fully displaying traits of assisting the KPA has increased in the country as days go by. Among them are the staff of Pyongyang Kumsonggori Primary School who have been active in the army assistance in the past 17 years, officials and employees of the Singye County Supply Centre for Nurseries and Kindergartens who have taken care of soldiers with sincerity in the past 18 years.
					
					The traits prevailing across the country are strikingly demonstrating the power of the DPRK, where all the army and people are rallied in one mind around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee of the Students Committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement denouncing the Japanese authorities' ambition to grab Tok Islets on December 29 last year.
					 The statement accused the Japanese government of disclosing its black-hearted intention to realize the "dominion over Tok Islets" in its "instruction manual containing high school curriculum guidelines" on social studies issued in Japan recently against the backdrop of the daily undisguised distortion of its history. No matter how many years may flow under the bridge the militarists will never change in their wild ambition for territorial expansion, it stressed, declaring that the organization would conduct a vigorous struggle against the above-said move of Japan.

articles.title: Former Chairperson of Hanchongryon Arrested
articles.content:
Former Chairperson of Hanchongryon Arrested
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The fascist police of south Korea arrested Song Hyo Won, chairperson of the 13th-term (south) Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon), on December 30 last year on charges of violation of the notorious "National Security Law."
					 The police had kicked off an arrest racket against her since it put her on the "want list" for several years on the charge of violating the NSL including "acts of praising and encouraging the north" and "admission to an enemy-benefiting organization" while being active as chairperson of Hanchongryon.

articles.title: DPRK Important Day Marked
articles.content:
DPRK Important Day Marked
 Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Denmark, Poland and Mongolia and seminars in Pakistan, Germany and Uganda from Dec. 18 to 24 on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, in his address at the meeting said that Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA was a dramatic event for the army and people of the DPRK struggling for the development of the cause of socialism.
					
					 D. Michka, general director of the Mongolian HUM Company Ltd., and J. Tsevelma, member of the Leading Council of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, recalled that Dec. 24 is the significant day not only for the Korean people but the Mongolian people, referring to the fact that Kim Jong Suk made an immortal contribution to the liberation of Korea and the cause of building a new country.
					
					 Mohammad Aslam Nagi, secretary general of the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, in his speech noted that Kim Jong Il has long pursued the unique Songun policy in all fields by developing in depth the idea and line of attaching importance to the arms and military affairs set forth by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Almas Jahra, secretary of the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, stressed that the Korean people have profound reverence for Kim Jong Suk because her life holds an extraordinary position in the modern history of Korea, adding that her august name will shine forever along with Kim Il Sung's Korea, Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Nider Sachsen State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany expounded that Kim Jong Il has turned the KPA into an invincible army and further developed the DPRK into the socialist power with his unique Songun policy, expressing support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Denmark and Mongolia and at the seminar in Germany.

articles.title: Ambiente de apoyo al ejercito en Corea
articles.content:
Ambiente de apoyo al ejercito en Corea
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ATCC) -- Hoy dia, el pueblo coreano, consciente de que el apoyo al ejercito es la maxima expresion del patriotismo, atiende con sinceridad a los uniformados como a sus consanguineos.
					El Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang ayuda desde hace mas de 10 anos hasta la fecha en mas de 110 ocasiones a los militares en la primera linea del frente. 
					
					La Oficina Administrativa de Restaurantes del capitalino municipio de Mangyongdae ayudo durante casi 20 anos con toda sinceridad a los militares. 
					
					Los funcionarios y empleados de una unidad perteneciente al Complejo de Acero Chollima hacen bien el apoyo al ejercito para que los militares guarden el honor de servicio militar y realicen meritos en ese curso. 
					
					El Hospital Popular de la provincia de Jagang puso toda su constancia y devocion en la curacion de los militares del ejercito popular. 
					
					En tanto, el Hospital Popular No. 1 de la ciudad de Hyesan recupero a un militar, quien estaba en agonia por un accidente inesperado durante su cumplimiento del deber militar, gracias a lo cual el enfermo pudo volver a su puesto.
					
					Se aumentan cada dia mas los que apoyan al ejercito, entre otros, los maestros  y  empleados de la Escuela Primaria de Kumsonggori de Pyongyang, quienes durante 17 anos hacen activamente sin interrupcion el apoyo al ejercito, los funcionarios y empleados del centro de suministro de materiales a las casas cunas y jardines infantiles del distrito de Singye, que atienden con el amor de padres paternales durante 18 anos a los militares del ejercito popular, y Song Rok Juk, moradora a la ribera del rio Tuman quien envia cada ano decenas de cerdos criados por si misma a los militares. 
					
					Tales aspectos hermosos de apoyo al ejercito manifiestan bien el poderio de Corea en que el ejercito y el pueblo estan unidos monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

e Industriales Coreanos en Japon, el Presidium del Comite Central de la Union de Jovenes Coreanos en Japon, el Presidium del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas Coreanas en Japon, el Permanente del CC de la Asociacion Educacional de Coreanos en Japon, el Consejo Permanente del CC de la Asociacion de Ciencia y Tecnologia de Coreanos en Japon, el Consejo Permanente del CC de la Asociacion de Cientificos Sociales Coreanos en Japon, el Consejo Permanente de la Federacion de Aficionados Atleticos Coreanos en Japon, el Presidium del CC de la Union de Escritores y Artistas la Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon (Chongryon), la Compania Choson Shinbo, el Servicio de Noticias de Corea, la Libreria Hagu, la Compania Operistica Kumgangsan, la Compania Limitada Comercial Tonghae, la Compania Limitada de Venta de Articulos Especiales Coreanos, la Asociacion por la Promocion de Intercambio Economico Corea-Japon, la Federacion Coreana de Intercambio Economico Asociado en 					Los mensajes y cartas rinden con motivo del Ano Nuevo la maxima gloria y la mas calida felicitacion al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, padre generoso de la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon, traduciendo la ilimitada veneracion hacia el.
					
					Expresan la decision de convertir a la Chongryon en la fila de unidad monolitica, que tenga gran coraje y fe en que saldra siempre victoriosa si goza de la guia del Dirigente, agrupar en torno a la Chongryon a amplias masas de compatriotas de distintos sectores y capas al librar el "movimiento por rebuscar a los compatriotas" como campana de toda la comunidad coreana en Japon y sumarse activamente a la lucha por defender y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".

articles.title: Emitidos nuevos sellos en Corea
articles.content:
Emitidos nuevos sellos en Corea
						
  Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 99 (2010) de la Era Juche, en Corea fue emitido un nuevo sello individual.
					  Este sello, en que esta dibujado el Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, muestra el elevado espiritu nacional y el temple invencible del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, que estan decididos a edificar sin falta en el territorio patrio una gran potencia prospera socialista, unidos monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Por otra parte, quedaron emitidos un papel enterizo de pequeno tamano y 2 sellos individuales que describen el tigre coreano.

articles.title: Publicada en China "Coleccion de canciones famosas coreanas"
articles.content:
Publicada en China "Coleccion de canciones famosas coreanas"
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ATCC) -- La Compania Limitada de Imprenta y Media de Beijing y la Editorial de Beijing de China dieron a luz la "Coleccion de canciones famosas coreanas" con motivo del 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre Corea y China.
					  Este libro, que  consta de 8 temas como "Cantar de la revolucion", "Cantar de la patria" y "Cantar del ejercito y el pueblo", recoge 130 canciones favoritas del pueblo coreano que han sido traducidas.
